title: The Last White Rose: Dynasty, Rebellion and Treason. The Secret Wars against the Tudors
description: The Wars of the Roses didn't end at the Battle of Bosworth in 1485. Despite the death of Richard III and Henry VII's victory, it continued underground into the following century with plots, pretenders and subterfuge by the ousted white rose faction. Here, Desmond Seward reviews the story of the Tudors' seizure of the throne.
author: Desmond Seward
